title: Futbol Americas: MLS Cup Final Preview
description:
On Thursday's episode of Futbol Americas, Herculez Gomez and Sebastian Salazar preview the MLS Cup Final between LAFC and Philadelphia Union. Head coaches Steve Cherundolo, Jim Curtin and Union goalkeeper Andre Blake sit down with Herc to preview the final. Also, the guys react to the FMF's attempt to lure Carlos Vela to return to El Tri. Is Vela's snub something, nothing or everything?

itunes:subtitle: Herculez Gomez sits down one-on-one with head coaches Steve Cherundolo and Jim Curtin
